SEARCH
Package controller

Class PassengerController

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
controller.PassengerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PassengerDAO
public class PassengerController extends Controller implements PassengerDAO
Controller class for managing Passenger entities. This class handles the creation and retrieval of Passenger objects in the database. It uses a singleton pattern to ensure only one instance of the controller is created. It extends the Controller class and implements the PassengerDAO interface. This class uses the singleton pattern to ensure that only one instance of the controller exists.

Example usage: 

 PassengerController controller = PassengerController.getInstance();
 int lastInsertedId = controller.createPassenger(passenger);
